attributes.action: Sack MPs who fail to recognise animal sentience
attributes.background:
In light of recent failure of MPs to recognise animal sentience. It is apparent these MPs are not intelligent enough to comprehend basic science, or that they themselves are not sentient.

On this basis, they are not fit for making decisions for the country and should be relieved of duties.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/205348
